snippet.title: Demon's Mirror - Official Announce Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
Watch the trailer for look at gameplay and enemies for this upcoming roguelike deckbuilding game, Demon's Mirror, showcased during Guerrilla Collective 2021 on Day 2. Demon's Mirror gives you an additional board of tiles to strategically chain together to sway the battle in your favor. Demon's Mirror is coming to PC.

#SummerofGaming
